    public static final class BaasBox.Config
extends java.lang.Object
    The configuration for BaasBox client
    Since:
    0.7.3

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String apiBasepath
      The relative path of the server, default is /.
      java.lang.String apiDomain
      The domain name of the server, default is "10.0.2.2 -refers to the localhost from emulator.
      java.lang.String appCode
      The BaasBox app code, default is 1234567890.
      BaasBox.Config.AuthType authenticationType
      The authentication type used by the SDK, default is BASIC_AUTHENTICATION.
      ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler 
      java.lang.String httpCharset
      The charset used for the HTTP connection, default is UTF-8.
      int httpConnectionTimeout
      Sets the timeout until a connection is established.
      int httpPort
      The port number of the server connection, default is 9000.
      int httpSocketTimeout
      Sets the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data.
      boolean useHttps
      if true the SDK use HTTPs protocol.
      int workerThreads
      Number of threads to use for asynchronous requests.

    • Field Detail

      • exceptionHandler

        public ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler

      • useHttps

        public boolean useHttps
        if true the SDK use HTTPs protocol. Default is false.

      • httpCharset

        public java.lang.String httpCharset
        The charset used for the HTTP connection, default is UTF-8.

      • httpPort

        public int httpPort
        The port number of the server connection, default is 9000.

      • httpConnectionTimeout

        public int httpConnectionTimeout
        Sets the timeout until a connection is established. A value of zero means the timeout is not used. The default value is 6000.

      • httpSocketTimeout

        public int httpSocketTimeout
        Sets the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data. A timeout value of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout. The default value is zero.

      • apiDomain

        public java.lang.String apiDomain
        The domain name of the server, default is "10.0.2.2 -refers to the localhost from emulator.

      • apiBasepath

        public java.lang.String apiBasepath
        The relative path of the server, default is /.

      • appCode

        public java.lang.String appCode
        The BaasBox app code, default is 1234567890.

      • authenticationType

        public BaasBox.Config.AuthType authenticationType
        The authentication type used by the SDK, default is BASIC_AUTHENTICATION.

      • workerThreads

        public int workerThreads
        Number of threads to use for asynchronous requests. If it's 0 it uses a computed default value.

      • BaasBox.Config

        public BaasBox.Config()
